mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , SUBJECT , USERID , IDATE FROM NEXI_CHAT WHERE DELETEYN = 'N' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SEQ) DESC

SELECT SEQ , SUBJECT , USERID , IDATE FROM NEXI_CHAT WHERE DELETEYN = 'N'
AND TO_DATE(${key}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{startdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{enddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ${key} LIKE '%' || #{value, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SEQ) DESC
mapper.insert: CREATE SEQUENCE ${tableName}_SEQ INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 MAXVALUE 1000000 MINVALUE 1 NOCYCLE
CREATE SEQUENCE ${fileTableName}_SEQ INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 MAXVALUE 1000000 MINVALUE 1 NOCYCLE
CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( SEQ VARCHAR2(1000) PRIMARY KEY ,USERID VARCHAR2(100) ,USERCS VARCHAR2(1000) ,IDATE VARCHAR2(100) ,DELYN VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N' )

CREATE TABLE ${fileTableName}( SEQ VARCHAR2(1000) PRIMARY KEY ,TABLESEQ VARCHAR2(1000) ,TEMPFILENAME VARCHAR2(1000) ,ORIGINFILENAME VARCHAR2(1000) ,USERID VARCHAR2(100) ,IDATE VARCHAR2(100) ,DELYN VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT CHAT_TABLE.SEQ , CHAT_TABLE.USERID , USERCS , TABLESEQ , TEMPFILENAME
FROM ${tableName} CHAT_TABLE LEFT OUTER JOIN ${fileTableName} FILE_TABLE ON CHAT_TABLE.SEQ = FILE_TABLE.SEQ AND CHAT_TABLE.USERID = FILE_TABLE.USERID AND CHAT_TABLE.DELYN = 'N' AND FILE_TABLE.DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(CHAT_TABLE.SEQ) DESC

SELECT SEQ , USERID , USERNAME FROM NEXI_SIGNUP WHERE USERID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND USERPW = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT USERID , DELYN FROM NEXI_SIGNUP WHERE USERID NOT IN #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT NC.SEQ , NC.SUBJECT , NC.USERID , NC.IDATE FROM NEXI_CHAT NC, NEXI_CHAT_USER NCU WHERE NCU.GUESTID = #{userid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NC.SEQ = NCU.SEQ ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NC.SEQ) DESC

SELECT SEQ ,CHATSEQ ,GUESTID ,DELYN ,CUTOFF FROM NEXI_CHAT_USER WHERE CHATSEQ = #{chatSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DELYN = 'N'
AND GUESTID = #{userid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
